testcase.name: Search functionality with valid or invalid input
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed When user clicks on the Search icon.........................................passed And user types valid or invalid "Octopus Real Estate" in the search box.....passed Then user should be able to see relevant searched result or an error message.passed

testcase.name: Search functionality with valid or invalid input 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed When user clicks on the Search icon.........................................passed And user types valid or invalid "Java" in the search box....................passed Then user should be able to see relevant searched result or an error message.passed

testcase.name: 'About' Feature - Simon Rogerson
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed When user clicks on 'About' icon............................................passed And user clicks on 'Simon Rogerson' from dropdown list......................passed Then user should be able to see 'About Simon Rogerson' page.................passed

testcase.name: Filter by Business
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed When user selects any option from Filter by Business dropdown list..........passed Then user should be able to see all posts from selected business............passed

testcase.name: Navigate back to previous/Insights Page from Businesses page
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed And user clicks on 'Businesses' icon........................................passed When user clicks on 'back arrow'............................................passed Then user should be able to navigate back to previous/Insights page.........passed

testcase.name: Click on page number '2'
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Insights Page of Octopus Group.........................passed When user scroll down the page..............................................passed And user clicks on '2'......................................................passed Then user should be able to see all the post from page '2'..................passed
